description:
Dashboard Covid-19 to Zabbix.

https://github.com/bernardolankheet/ZBX-GRA-COVID19

Homologated:
Zabbix 4.2.8, 4.4.4 and 4.4.7

Grafana 6.6.2, 6.7.1

Required plugins:
1) grafana-worldmap-panel - https://grafana.com/grafana/plugins/grafana-worldmap-panel
2) alexanderzobnin-zabbix-app - https://grafana.com/grafana/plugins/alexanderzobnin-zabbix-app

panels.content:
CORONA VIRUS WORLD


Data Sources: https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus and https://corona.lmao.ninja

Obs: Data contained in this panel are for testing purposes of the tool

https://medium.com/@bernardolankheet

title: COVID-19
